explains: adj. 悲哀的；令人惋惜的

sentences.en: He looked mournful, even near to tears.
sentences.cn: 他看上去很悲伤，几乎要掉泪了。

sentences.en: I couldn't bear the mournful look on her face.
sentences.cn: 我受不了她脸上那忧伤的神情。

sentences.en: One voice said, and another said, "Oh, mournful day."
sentences.cn: 一个声音说，另一个声音说，"噢，悲伤的一天。"
